turkish_example_sentence: O, bu akşamki partiye gereksiz hediyeler almamalı.
english_example_sentence: He/She must not take unnecessary gifts to tonight's party.
russian_example_sentence: Он/Она не должен/должна брать ненужные подарки на сегодняшнюю вечеринку.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O, bu akşamki partiye gereksiz hediyeler ______.
